name: Nymph's Dream
title: Nymph's Dream
desc: "And just as how some people treasure withered flowers, some still reminisce endlessly over the afternoon adventures that have yet to continue..."
in_play_description:
When the attached character uses a Skill: Adventure Once. (Twice per Round)
If you have completed an Adventure, the attached character deals +1 DMG.

skills.desc:
When the attached character uses a Skill: Starts an Adventure. (Twice per Round)
If you have completed an Adventure, the attached character deals +1 DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
